content.body:
> <@zcorpan:mozilla.org> https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/common-microsyntaxes.html#rules-for-parsing-floating-point-number-values step 16

Right — and that’s relevant _if_ either the “valid floating-point number” algorithm or the https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/input.html#number-state-(type=number):valid-floating-point-number-4 requirement invoke the “rules for parsing floating-point number values” algorithm. But as far as I can see, neither part does. At least they definitely don’t _directly_ invoke it.
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @zcorpan:mozilla.org
https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/common-microsyntaxes.html#rules-for-parsing-floating-point-number-values step 16
Right — and that’s relevant if either the “valid floating-point number” algorithm or the https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/input.html#number-state-(type=number):valid-floating-point-number-4 requirement invoke the “rules for parsing floating-point number values” algorithm. But as far as I can see, neither part does. At least they definitely don’t directly invoke it.
